androidx.core.provider

Class FontsContractCompat.FontInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.core.provider.FontsContractCompat.FontInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    FontsContractCompat

    public static class FontsContractCompat.FontInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Object represent a font entry in the family returned from FontsContractCompat.fetchFonts(Context, CancellationSignal, androidx.core.provider.FontRequest).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FontInfo(Uri uri, int ttcIndex, int weight, boolean italic, int resultCode)
      Creates a Font with all the information needed about a provided font.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getResultCode()
      Returns result code.
      int getTtcIndex()
      Returns the index to be used to access this font when accessing a TTC file.
      Uri getUri()
      Returns a URI associated to this record.
      int getWeight()
      Returns the weight value for this font.
      boolean isItalic()
      Returns whether this font is italic.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FontInfo

        public FontInfo(@NonNull
                Uri uri,
                int ttcIndex,
                int weight,
                boolean italic,
                int resultCode)
        Creates a Font with all the information needed about a provided font.
        Parameters:
        uri - A URI associated to the font file.
        ttcIndex - If providing a TTC_INDEX file, the index to point to. Otherwise, 0.
        weight - An integer that indicates the font weight.
        italic - A boolean that indicates the font is italic style or not.
        resultCode - A boolean that indicates the font contents is ready.

    • Method Detail

      • getUri

        @NonNull
public Uri getUri()
        Returns a URI associated to this record.

        public int getTtcIndex()
        Returns the index to be used to access this font when accessing a TTC file.

      • getWeight

        public int getWeight()
        Returns the weight value for this font.

      • isItalic

        public boolean isItalic()
        Returns whether this font is italic.

      • getResultCode

        public int getResultCode()
        Returns result code. FontsContractCompat.Columns.RESULT_CODE
